SEARCH
Package it.polimi.coordinator

Class HadoopCoordinator

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.common.HadoopFileManager
it.polimi.coordinator.HadoopCoordinator
public class HadoopCoordinator extends HadoopFileManager
The HadoopCoordinator class is responsible for managing the files on HDFS at coordinator-side. It extends the HadoopFileManager class. It contains methods to delete files, upload files, get keys size, merge files locally and upload merged files.

  • Field Summary

    • uploadMergedFiles

      public void uploadMergedFiles(String id, String i, List<String> files) throws IOException
      This method uploads the merged files to HDFS.
      Parameters:
      id - it is the id of the program.
      i - it is the number of the task.
      files - it is the list of files to upload.
      Throws:
      IOException - if it is not possible to upload the merged files.
